```
cluster:
  leader:
    serviceName: cluster
    serviceId: node-1
    consul:
      host: localhost
      port: 8500
      discovery:
        enabled: false
    session:
      ttl: 15
      refresh: 7
    election:
      envelopeTemplate: services/%s/leader
```
